CustomField.description: Auto-created Relationships are auto-deduplicated to prevent duplicate Relationship records from being created between two Contacts. Check this box to disable this behavior & allow multiple Relationships of the same Type to be created between two Contacts
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Se eliminan los duplicados de relaciones creadas automáticamente para evitar la creación de registros duplicados entre contactos. Al seleccionarse desactiva este comportamiento y permite la creación de múltiples relaciones del mismo tipo entre contactos.
CustomField.label: Allow Auto-Created Duplicate Relations
